About

Hello My name is Bibek Adhikari (बिबेक अधिकारी) and I’m a student of Kathmandu,Nepal, currently in Punjab,India for my Btech who loves to design, front-end development and coding a lot.

The name Bibek is pronounced as Beebek, means mindfull or mind in Sanskrit.

Let's be frineds

You can feel free to join me on any of the network or website below

Writing content is a matter of work. Sometimes it requires more than a night to write a content, but making design in fun. I made this website so I would be able to do both.

About the Site

In this site you will find a collection random posts, any random post may be available in this blog. It may include how to play game, or making new css theme, using bootstrap,etc

In case if you wanted to know,this site is

  • Designed and developed on Kali OS
  • Developed with Atom
  • Built on Jekyll, the open source static site grenerator
  • Hosted on Github

    • If you enjoy the content found here, you might like to suscribe to my feed. Also feel free to send me any feedback,comments, or suggestions. This site is currently on a developing mode so the site is not complete with it’s layout and many other components.
